channel.description: Recent changes in Reservation API on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Distribution: Overview
item.description: The Reservation API is a solution included for Distribution-X clients who want to search, consult and update their reservation logs. With this API, you will be able to consum all its operations using json format. In order to call any operation, it would be necessary the following data: AccesToken (encripted data). User. Password.
